title: Logging onto chat service
body: Changing the Time hasn't worked for me at all, is there any fix to this please? I've tried repairing and reinstalling and it isn't working at all. Please this is frustrating.

replies.body: This is currently a known issue, but I don't have an eta just yet.  Bookmark the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) page!   Updates will be provided as soon as it's becomes available!
